page.title: 06BEACON PARK - SKELMERSDALE
page.content: Skelmersdale Development Corporation landscaped Beacon Country Park 16 years ago and planted lots of trees. They planted 9,030 Sycamore,6,675 Beech,6220 Willow,5815 Alder,855 Rowen ,790 Scots Pine and 460 Oak.The park has 3 areas,Countryside,Catering and golfing .It has an 18-hole{Golf Course {,Bridleway,Picnic Areas,Nature Trails and large fields.It covers 304 acres and there are lots of special events like Horse and Dog shows.If you attend a Caravan Rally in July-August it costs Â£2.50 and in September-June Â£1.75.Orienteering costs 10p for a map and its 50p for a permit for{Horse {Riding}all year. A{fishing}permit is 50p Adults,28p Juniors.They are in the process of setting-up Nature Watch groups for children.The park is very good for tobogganing in Winter.
